entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Optimize the package by removing the unnecessary runtimes when publishing #14646
  • Unable to deploy app with `Debug | x86 config`; must hardcode `RuntimeIdentifier` #14644
  • Grid auto height behaving differently between Windows and Android #14643
    Backlog
  • [Android] Navigating event not fired from WebView for data:video links with download attribute presented #14636
    Backlog
  • ByteArray as Source in <Image> is not loading when run in Android Version 12 #14635
  • Allow `Shell.Current.DisplayPromptAsync` to be cancelled with a `CancellationTokenSource` #14631
  • PointerGestureRecognizer CommandParameter using ICommand as declaring Type instead of object #14629
  • TableCell Margin | Spacing #14628
    Backlog

Closed

  • Can't Vertically Align anything with Entry in a Grid #14645
  • MAUI 7.0: ListView with Recycling strategy causes issues with images, on both iOS and Android #13008
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Bug] Border sizes to container instead of wrapping content #2692
    Backlog
  • When I run my .Net Maui project and enter a page it says "application has stopped" and the execution ends, on android #14428
  • Getting error on code that is not generated in MAUI #14430
  • Open the accessibility of all theme related classes and structures. #14455
  • TypeConverter not respected when evaluating Binding #7683
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Try a new Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Maui SDK #14640
  • [Housekeeping] Removed fixed page background color in the Gallery #14639
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [xamlc] enable for $(Configuration) names like ReleaseProd #14638
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢

Merged

  • [graphics] fix CA1307 and CA1309 for performance #14627
    area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️
  • Make Benchmarks.Droid runnable as APK for perf testing #14447
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [Tests] Move sample build test to IntegrationTests #14499
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Switch to AppWindowTitleBar From SetTitleBar #14517
  • Support both Update and Include for maui #14576
    area/setup 🪄
  • Fix issue using FillRule with Paths #14493
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
  • [Android] Fix IsEnabled property on Android SearchBar #14616
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix Entry issues with Keyboard using IsPassword #14382
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [uitests] Work for get appium uitests with CI #14488
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Allow SearchBar to take full width on Android #13716
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Optimize iOS selection synchronization #14613
  • Remove HandlerImpl folder and put partial files together #14339
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix gestures in Label Spans #14410
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [controls] fix performance issue in {AppThemeBinding} #14625
    area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃, area/controls 🎮
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.5.1.2 to 2.6.1 #14291
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Added ICommandMapper for extension methods #14545
  • [CI] Do not rebuild the ms tasks on device tests. #14476
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
